name: Oasis
description: A small pool fringed with palms. Sweet, cool water.
message: You drink deeply at the oasis. Health +3.

choices.label: Drink deeply
choices.message: Water floods your throat. Health +3.

choices.label: Rest in the shade
choices.message: A short rest steadies you. Health +1.

choices.label: Move on quickly
choices.message: You leave the oasis behind.

name: Mirage
description: A wavering image on the horizon that might promise relief or trick the eye.
message: You chase a mirage and waste time and strength. Health -1.

choices.label: Chase it
choices.message: It was not what you hoped. Health -1.

choices.label: Observe from afar
choices.message: You decide it is a trick and move on.

choices.label: Wait patiently
choices.message: The heat blurs and the image fades.

name: Cactus Patch
description: A stand of thorny cacti; some offer moisture, some sharp wounds.
message: You prick yourself on a cactus. Health -1.

choices.label: Harvest water carefully
choices.message: You extract a little moisture. Health +1.

choices.label: Push through
choices.message: You are scratched badly. Health -2.

choices.label: Avoid it
choices.message: You skirt the cactus patch.

name: Nomad Trader
description: A weathered trader carrying water skins and small goods.
dialogue: A little bartered coin keeps the road kinder.

choices.label: Buy water
choices.message: You gain refreshment. Health +2.

choices.label: Trade a story
choices.message: You feel steadied by shared tales. Faith +1.

choices.label: Ignore and walk on
choices.message: You continue down the dune.

name: Scorpion
description: A silent, dangerous hunter hiding under a stone.
dialogue: The scorpion's tail twitches in the dust.

choices.label: Avoid it
choices.message: You step away carefully.

choices.label: Try to catch it
choices.message: It stings you. Health -2.

choices.label: Use a stick to prod
choices.message: You disturb it and get nicked. Health -1.

name: Sandstorm
description: A wall of wind and grit rushes across the plain.

choices.label: Shelter behind dune
choices.message: You wait out part of the storm.

choices.label: Brace and push through
choices.message: You struggle and lose strength. Health -2.

choices.label: Cover your face and crawl
choices.message: You avoid deeper harm. Health -1.

name: Ruined Caravan
description: Worn wagons half-buried in sand; there might be salvageable goods.
message: You search the wreckage for useful items.

choices.label: Scavenge carefully
choices.message: You find preserved rations. Health +1.

choices.label: Force open a chest
choices.message: You cut yourself on rusty metal. Health -1.

choices.label: Leave it alone
choices.message: You step away from the wreck.

name: Desert Wyrm
description: A burrowing predator that senses vibrations in the sand.

choices.label: Run
choices.message: You escape but are grazed. Health -1.

choices.label: Fight
choices.message: You struggle with the beast. Health -3.

choices.label: Hide still
choices.message: You remain motionless until it passes.

name: Oasis Grove
description: A sheltered pool ringed by a few palms and shade.
message: You rest in the cool shade of the oasis.

name: Caravan Wreck
description: Half-buried wagons and scattered crates; some useful remnants remain.
message: You search the wreck and find something useful or sharp.

name: Hidden Pit
description: A shallow pit concealed by loose sand; easy to step into by accident.
message: You nearly fall into a concealed pit.

name: Stone Ring
description: A small circle of weathered stones half-buried in sand.
message: You step into an old stone ring and feel its age.

name: Buried Well
description: A collapsed well whose mouth is mostly filled with sand; cool air rises from below.
message: You peer into the buried well and find cool damp air below.

name: Sand Tomb
description: A small stone tomb, its entrance clogged with grit and time.
message: You uncover a sand-clogged tomb entrance.

name: Dune Shrine
description: A crudely carved shrine half-buried in sand, its symbols eroded.
message: You stand before the dune shrine and feel a faint hush.
